game.name: 绘色星落(Brush The Starfall）
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Brush the Starfall uniquely blends strategic color filling with fragmented storytelling. Paint the board to specified colors within limited moves to solve elegant logic puzzles. Through journal entries, experience a poignant story of warmth and farewell.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Brush the Starfall uniquely blends strategic color filling with fragmented storytelling. Paint the board to specified colors within limited moves to solve elegant logic puzzles. Through journal entries, experience a poignant story of warmth and farewell.
